alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 11:47PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BENTON...NORTH CENTRAL WASHINGTON...NORTHEASTERN DELAWARE AND SOUTHEASTERN OTTAWA COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 AM CDT... At 1146 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Grove to 4 miles northeast of Decatur. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Springdale... Bentonville... Bella Vista... Grove... Tontitown... Gravette... Cave Springs... Decatur... Highfill... Springtown... Maysville... Northwest Arkansas Regional Air... Honey Creek State Park... Hiwasse... Centerton... Johnson... Dodge... Elm Springs... Cayuga... Vaughn... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 69 and 72. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
